metadata.description: Complete Shopify development toolkit with specialized agents for theme development, app development, and Polaris UI. Includes 16 expert agents, comprehensive skills, and battle-tested patterns.

plugins.name: shopify-liquid-specialist
plugins.description: Shopify Liquid templating expert for sections, snippets, and templates. Generates pure Liquid code following Shopify best practices without framework dependencies.
plugins.author: Saroj Punde

plugins.name: shopify-section-builder
plugins.description: Specialized in creating Shopify 2.0 sections with complete schemas, settings, and blocks. Follows theme development best practices.
plugins.author: Saroj Punde

plugins.name: shopify-global-settings
plugins.description: Manages Shopify theme global settings (settings_schema.json). Expert in theme customization options, color schemes, typography, and layout settings.
plugins.author: Saroj Punde

plugins.name: shopify-snippet-library
plugins.description: Creates reusable Liquid snippets with proper documentation. Builds snippet library for product cards, buttons, forms, and common UI elements.
plugins.author: Saroj Punde

plugins.name: shopify-translation-manager
plugins.description: Manages Shopify theme translations and locale files. Handles multi-language support, translation keys, and internationalization workflows.
plugins.author: Saroj Punde

plugins.name: shopify-app-orchestrator
plugins.description: Multi-agent task coordinator for full-stack Shopify app features spanning database, API, and UI layers. Coordinates complex workflows and ensures proper integration.
plugins.author: Saroj Punde

plugins.name: shopify-polaris-ui
plugins.description: Polaris Web Components expert for building Shopify app UIs. Ensures proper component usage, accessibility, and design patterns for React-based Shopify apps.
plugins.author: Saroj Punde

plugins.name: shopify-database-specialist
plugins.description: Database and Prisma expert for Shopify apps. Handles schema design, migrations, query optimization, and data modeling for app backend.
plugins.author: Saroj Punde

plugins.name: shopify-api-integration
plugins.description: Shopify Admin GraphQL API expert. Handles API integration, queries, mutations, rate limiting, webhooks, and metafield operations for Shopify apps.
plugins.author: Saroj Punde

plugins.name: shopify-design-system
plugins.description: Design system compliance expert for Shopify apps. Ensures consistent use of Polaris tokens, color schemes, typography, and spacing.
plugins.author: Saroj Punde

plugins.name: shopify-pattern-enforcer
plugins.description: Pattern consistency checker for Shopify app codebases. Identifies similar patterns and ensures fixes are applied consistently across the entire codebase.
plugins.author: Saroj Punde

plugins.name: polaris-component-expert
plugins.description: Polaris Web Components expert with access to full component library. Provides guidance on using actions, forms, feedback, media, structure, and text components.
plugins.author: Saroj Punde

plugins.name: polaris-forms-specialist
plugins.description: Expert in Polaris form components. Specializes in text fields, checkboxes, selects, file uploads, and form validation patterns.
plugins.author: Saroj Punde

plugins.name: polaris-layout-specialist
plugins.description: Expert in Polaris layout and structure components. Specializes in pages, cards, grids, stacks, and responsive layouts.
plugins.author: Saroj Punde

plugins.name: polaris-patterns-expert
plugins.description: Expert in Polaris composition patterns. Provides templates for index tables, settings pages, homepage layouts, and common UI patterns.
plugins.author: Saroj Punde

plugins.name: polaris-app-bridge-specialist
plugins.description: Expert in Shopify App Bridge components. Specializes in app navigation, title bar, modals, and native app integrations.
plugins.author: Saroj Punde
